column4: I am using Amarok 1.4something in 8.10 (64bit) and my collection has dissapeared, I don't know why.  I have tried numerous fixes I found on the web, but nothing has worked.  Anyone have any ideas?
the actual files or just the library that catalogued the files?
the files are fine, but amarok, exaile, and rthmnbox are all having difficulties with collection/library

i'm not sure about rhythmbox, but i know that amarok and exaile use sqlite by default. i'd reinstall that package and also remove any configuration files you have in your home directory ("ls ~/.* -d" will help)
